name: Get Home (viesha)
description:
Get Home is a RPG with simple objective - reach the house or you may not survive.

Currently in it's earliest prototype state, it tests basic elements for the game idea.

More RPG elements will come in future releases.

P.S. As you can see, some of the objects in the game prototype are from Unity's Creator's kit (character and not moving NPC).  Not completely sure how this Extension Asset is licensed (though I'm pretty sure that I can use it in my project and give others to play), but it's going to be replaced with my own pixel art in the future.

Attributions:

Art - Jetrel, Zabin, Hyptosis, and Surt. https://opengameart.org/content/lots-of-trees-and-plants-from-oga-db32-tilesets-...

Sound from https://www.zapsplat.com

Main Menu poster - Heny

Main Menu music - Viesha

I invite you to join my weekly blog here https://somethingofagamedev.wordpress.com/
